title: [FR][External Tools]: adding hotkeys
author: PetbkA
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->
External tools are convenient way to, for instance, call registry editor or ping some port of the remote machine. Such tools can be used quite often, and it would be nice to call them by customizable hotkeys.

iterations.description: Feature request to add customizable keyboard shortcuts for external tools, enabling quick invocation without mouse

comments.author: sparerd
comments.snippet: Related to #196 in the fact that we need to create a hotkey manager to set, save, load, and detect hotkeys.

notes:
AI triage (claude): Feature request to add customizable keyboard shortcuts for external tools, enabling quick invocation without mouse
Approach: Add a Keys Hotkey property to ExternalTool, add a hotkey editor control in ExternalToolsWindow, register global hotkeys in frmMain via ProcessCmdKey override, persist hotkey values in settings save/load, and add conflict detection against existing shortcuts
